SEARCH
Package com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.logger

Class LogEntryBuffer

java.lang.Object
com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.logger.LogEntryBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
public class LogEntryBuffer extends Object implements Observable
This class represents a buffer for logging entries and implements the Observable interface. It allows attaching and detaching observers and notifying them upon data changes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rikin Dipakkumar Chauhan
